title: The Feral Children 2: Savages
description: "Her blades spoke the language of pain."Prosperity filled the days of the orphaned survivors and their animal companions as the fierce battle with Gordon and his gang faded into a distant memory. They thought they were doing well. They thought the hard part was over. They were wrong.   Fur and fangs, claws and steel will be put to the ultimate test as the tribe seeks justice and revenge against those who won't leave them in peace. To survive, you have to fight.A wild ride that will keep you on the edge of your seat, this post-apocalyptic series features a unique adventure full of bonding and friendship, but also violence and betrayal. Don’t threaten the children when the wolves are near.Scroll up and grab your copy today!
author: David A. Simpson
